description: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in BAnner ROtation System mini (BAROSmini) 0.32.595 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the baros_path parameter to (1) include/common_functions.php, and the main_path parameter to (2) lib_users.php, (3) lib_stats.php, and (4) lib_slots.php in include/lib/.
